title: I'M HERE!
description: Working my programming skills and building this map, is what I'm doing right now! In May I'll return to the road and continue on the European Bike Tour!

title: It's On!
description: Alright, it's on! Today I packed up my bags, got to the center square in town to wave everyone goodbye, then went back home to get the right bags on the bike and then left for a 4-month long bike tour that is going to take me around Europe through more than 15 countries...

title: Dewy Tent, Missing the Kickstand, Meeting Grandparents and Some Rice!
description: So on this second day of my European Bike Tour, I wake up in a dewy tent, talk about getting a gear shed, show you around the campground a little and explain the weird hanging baskets in the shower area...

title: I Went Up Someone's Backyard!
description: So today started with a dewy tent again, so I packed everything up very quickly to ride to a sunny place where I could dry my stuff...

title: I Stayed At A German's House!
description: This day I made it across the border for the first time! But in Germany, my 4G was not working anymore for some reason... Helpless as I was, someone on the street saw me and offered me a place to stay, which I gratefully accepted. So that night I ended up at a German's house!

title: Taking Shelter From the Rain!
description: I cycled onwards towards Bremen, Germany. This day was pretty rainy...

title: Arrived in Bremen!
description: I finally arrived in my first big city in Germany! I finally started to realise that I cycled all the way to Bremen!

title: Exploring the city of Bremen!
description: I take a day off to explore the city of Bremen and do some other things. I go to an electronic store, look at some legos and buy some pants. Chinese food in the evening.

title: Random German Tractor Parade Encounter!
description: I leave the hostel in Bremen and use a Locus map to cycle to Hamburg. I encounter a random German tractor parade with weird carts with partying people in them. One guy even gave me some sweets!

title: I DID IT!!!
description: On the way I unfortunately got a flat tire and had to fix it, which reminded me of the last time I fixed a flat and struggled at the last bit to the point I had to call a bike shop. This time that wasn’t really an option so I kept on trying and trying to get the tire back into the rim and I almost gave up… but in the end I found the strength and conquered this tire!

title: City Cycling through Hamburg!
description: I rode a little bit over the center square and then made my way towards the Speicherstadt. Then I cycled onwards towards North-East towards Lübeck.

title: Cycling through Lübeck, Germany!
description: I make my way to the city of Lübeck, Germany. I fall down, cross the border of the ice in the ice age, fly my DJI Spark drone a little. Lots of rain on and off. Beautiful city and great times.

title: Almost Got Blown Off My Bike!
description: There was an autumn storm coming over so I planned to stay put for the day. I went to the reception to ask if the storm is going to be really bad. There was a weather alarm going on aswell which frightened me, but the storm didn't really come until I went to the supermarket...

title: Arrived in Rostock!
description: Road to Rostock. The storm from yesterday had a name: Sebastian. This day no rain hit me though.

title: Made it to Denmark!
description: I made it to the ferry port and got on the boat to Denmark! The 3rd country I ever cycled through! Got welcomed with another downpour though... But hey, I made it!

title: I LEFT MY WALLET AT THE SIDE OF THE ROAD!!
description: The worst nightmare of every bike tourer came true for me today: I left my wallet at the side of the road, only to realise it 20km later...

title: BEST CAMPSITE EVER!
description: Visited Møns klint which was absolutely beautiful. Made my way out of Møns klint towards the road that I already cycled through twice. Luckily, I was treated with one of the best campsites ever! And it was totally FREE!!

title: Arrived in Copenhagen!!
description: Made it to Copenhagen and to the hostel right next to Nyhavn.

title: Exploring Copenhagen by Bicycle
description: A great day exploring the beautiful city of Copenhagen, Denmark!

title: Wildcamping in Sweden!
description: Cycle out of the city of Copenhagen to Helsingør where I jumped on a ferry to Helsingborg, Sweden! I also wildcamped for the first time ever there!

title: I Got My Own Private Pool!
description: After about 2 weeks of pretty much non-stop cycling, I take a break in a beautiful house in Hjärsås, Sweden. It was quite an upgrade from my small little tent!

title: The First Hills and Puncturing my Air Matress...
description: I say goodbye to my hosts in Hjärsås, Sweden, where I stayed for a week. I started early so I could make a big distance.

title: Am I still in Sweden?!
description: Cycling along windmills and flat countryside in a province of Sweden called Halland, which really reminded me of my home country, Holland.

title: Cycling through Gothenborg!
description: Cycling through Gothenborg, seeing some cool places in the city. The landscape is changing, mountains are coming up.

title: LOADS of RAIN and PLAN CHANGES!
description: Rain. Loads of rain, all the time.

title: Made it to NORWAY!!
description: I made it to the border of Norway!! I had a wild camping camp spot, close to a lake with a nice view.

title: Do I need Winter Tires?!
description: It was dry so that was nice. Crossed the city of Halden where I climbed a fortress with a nice view. Oslo is coming closer. Gonna have to do some things about the bike, because cold weather is coming up...

title: I arrived in OSLO!!
description: Had some difficulties during the day but at sunset I finally arrived in Oslo and the view on the city was nice, but that was the last shot before I found the hostel wasn't as expected, so I didn't end the vlog and leave you guys with a little cliffhanger for the next one.

title: Everything Is So EXPENSIVE Here!!
description: First full day in Oslo. Made my way out of the awful hostel I was in and got another place to stay.

links.name: Exploring Oslo!! (A little better than yesterday!!)

title: Exploring Oslo!! (A little better than yesterday!!)
description: Second day in Oslo, Norway. Met up with a friend who lived there. Had some payment problems. Spent way too much money on tweaking a little on my bike in a bike shop. But I also got to explore some pretty cool stuff in the city.

title: I Almost Crashed My Drone!!
description: This day I left the pension in Oslo and went on my way to Bergen! This is going to be a difficult leg because I'm going to cross my first big mountain chain and the forecast was snow and cold for that place...

title: Beautiful Autumn Colors in Norway!
description: The first big climb was coming up... It was tough and also for the first time really cold, especially in the beginning where I had a very long downhill from my campsite...

title: Everything Is FROZEN!
description: Things are starting to get colder...

title: Definitely a TOUGH Day! And camping in the SNOW!
description: Woke up it was raining. Spent all morning trying to fix another flat tire. Got laughed at by the campground owner. Climbing in the rain, being soaking wet. Got to camp in the snow. This day was pretty tough...

title: Cycling in The ARCTIC!
description: The day started very cold again. Had to climb 3 huge mountains to make it to the place I had an Airbnb Apartment. Thanks to BicycleTouringPro I found a free hot shower along the way!

title: I'm READY for the SNOW!
description: Finally a rest day! Time to dry out all my equipment and prepare for the next stage, which was supposed to get even worse...

title: Worst Headwind EVER
description: Made my way out of Geilo. Had one of the worst headwinds ever and it didn't get any better. Luckily I could find shelter at some abandoned houses, where I also set up camp, after plowing through for 6 hours, and having covered only 42...

title: Made it to the BEAUTIFUL FJORDS!
description: Finally the road curved downhill and I rolled into the beautiful fjords area in Norway!

title: BEST DETOUR EVER!!
description: I wanted to take a ferry but it didn't leave until 3 hours after I left so I decided to go the other way around a fjord and I thought I would be faster... But at the end of the day I only made it to the other side of that ferry! I had no regrets, though.

title: I'M SMOKING!
description: It was raining for the whole day today. But at least it was warm. It was so warm that during an uphill my body started to smoke!

title: LAUGH ALL YOU WANT!! I Made It to Bergen!!
description: Long road to Bergen. Luckily it was sunny and warm, the night had been very cold though! At night I finally arrived in the city of Bergen.

title: One Day in BERGEN, Norway!
description: This day was a day full of exploring all the beautiful things there are to do in Bergen, Norway!

title: Roadside Ruins!
description: This vlog is the first from the leg from Bergen to Stavanger on my European Bike Tour. Followed the Eurovelo North Sea route. A nice ferry at the end of the day.

title: LOADS of BRIDGES
description: Beautiful scenery. Fjords aren't as high as before Bergen though. A lot of bridges and bodies of water.

title: Last Ferry to STAVANGER
description: This was probably gonna be the last cycling in Norway for me! Last bit of beautiful scenery in Western Norway.

title: I MET SOMEONE...
description: In Stavanger I met a guy at a Sturbucks who was very interested in my story and hosted me that night! I even went with him to a meeting about a business he was working for: 'ForEver Living'. He wanted me to do the same thing as well but I declined the offer.. It was quite an interesting experience though!

title: Some EXPLANATIONS and THE TIME I ALMOST GAVE UP
description: Took a train back to Oslo, from which the plan was to take a bus to Stockholm, Sweden. But it turned out bikes were not allowed on buses and the train was also not an option. I decided to cycle all the way to Stockholm, Sweden...

title: I'M GONNA DO IT!!!
description: I left Daniel's house, a guy I could stay with for free because of the Warmshowers app. He was a very nice guy and helped me plan my next leg to Stockholm, Sweden.

title: Racing to Stockholm! (part 1)
description: Cycling towards Stockholm. 400 km in 4 days...

title: Racing to Stockholm! (part 2)
description: Not much going on, loads of forests in Sweden.

title: WHERE DID YOU POOP??
description: Strong tailwind, finally some good distance: 134 km!! Spent the night at a campground where I had to poop at a pretty weird place...

title: Arrived in Stockholm!
description: Finally made it to Stockholm!

title: My Mom Has Arrived!
description: My mom came visit me in the city of Stockholm. I picked her up at the airport and we ate at an Argentinian restaurant there.

links.name: Going to Skansen Open Air Museum, Traditional Swedish Clothing and Houses!
WEIRDEST Place I've Ever Camped At!

title: Exploring Stockholm with my Mom!
description: Today me and my mom spent the day exploring the city of Stockholm. We went to the Gamla Stan (Old Town), Royal Palace, Storkyrkan and many more sites. In the afternoon we visited the History Museum about the Vikings, which was also very interesting, and free!

links.name: Going to Skansen Open Air Museum, Traditional Swedish Clothing and Houses!
WEIRDEST Place I've Ever Camped At!

title: Going to Skansen Open Air Museum, Traditional Swedish Clothing and Houses!
description: Today we visited the Skansen Open Air Museum, which is one of the best museums in Stockholm, Sweden. There are a lot of old buildings and people dressed the way they were in the old days.

links.name: WEIRDEST Place I've Ever Camped At!

title: WEIRDEST Place I've Ever Camped At!
description: Filled the day with some more sightseeing on my own. Went to some places my mom and I missed. The issue was that I couldn't stay at the Airbnb of last night anymore so I rode around the city trying to find a campground to stay. After no luck I decided to stand at a very interesting place...

links.name: Going to Skansen Open Air Museum, Traditional Swedish Clothing and Houses!

title: Made it to SUOMI FINLAND!!
description: I took a very early ferry to my next destination: Finland! Loads of islands along the way.

title: Little Bike Tour Around TURKU, Finland
description: The host of the Airbnb Apartment I stayed at gave me a little tour of the nearby town of Turku.

title: Finland ROCKS!!
description: On my way to Salo, where I could stay at a family member of one of my fans. Have only met amazing people here, Finland Rocks!

title: REAL FINNISH SAUNA EXPERIENCE!
description: After going to a few spots in Salo, Finland, I cycled on for about 40 km where I could stay at another family members' house of my fan. This one was very nice and the house was very unique, like it stood still in time. They also had an authentic Finnish sauna I could try out!

title: I Never Had To CAMP in Finland!
description: After saying goodbye to my great hosts, I cycled the last 90 km to the capital Helsinki. I also realised I never had to camp in Finland. There were always great people to host me.

title: An Epic Day in HELSINKI!
description: Today I explored the city of Helsinki! I went to a few cool places, like Suomen Linna fortress, a church in a rock and more...

title: BEAUTIFUL TALLINN
description: I went on a ferry to the next country and the next capital: Tallinn!! Tallin is a beautiful city with a lot of cool old buildings and a beautiful city center. When I first entered the city through it's Northern gate, I was very surprised.

links.name: Last Full Day in Tallinn! Last Thoughts About Forever Living

title: Some Sightseeing In Tallinn, Estonia!
description: I did some sightseeing in the city of Tallinn. Went to the Alexander Nevski Cathedral and a few viewpoints. Tallinn is one of the most beautiful cities I've ever visited.

links.name: Last Full Day in Tallinn! Last Thoughts About Forever Living

title: Last Full Day in Tallinn! Last Thoughts About Forever Living
description: Today I prepared for the next and last leg of the first part of the European Bike tour. I tried to find some new tires, but gave up because I couldn't find a bike shop that was open or at the same spot Google Maps told me it was supposed to be. Did some more sightseeing.

title: MY TIRE EXPLODED
description: Left the hostel southbound towards Latvia. About 20km out of town I heard a loud bang and had a flat tire. Later I found out there was an inch-wide hole in the outer tire, unfixable for that moment so I took a train back to Tallinn and went to the one bike shop in Tallinn I hadn't been to, turned out they had the right tires!

links.name: Last Full Day in Tallinn! Last Thoughts About Forever Living

title: I'M WIPED
description: Take 2 of my attempty to cycle to Riga, Latvia. Now with some good tires. But I pushed the boundaries quite high by booking an Airbnb apartment in Pärnu, Estonia, some 140 km away from Tallinn! I made it, but I was wiped by the end of the day.

title: Made it to LATVIA!
description: Left the quaint place in Pärnu, Estonia and made my way south towards Latvia. Had the winter sun in my face so it was pretty tough but eventually I made it to the border!

title: LAST DAY OF CYCLING!
description: The last bit of cycling for this trip was here! I decided to call it quite in Riga, Latvia for now, I will return to Riga in May 2018.

title: NATIONAL DAY IN RIGA, LATVIA
description: Coincidentally it was Latvia Independence Day right when I was there! So I went and celebrated the National Day of a country I barely knew something about. It was quite interesting.

title: LOTS OF BUSES!!
description: Luckily there was place for my bicycle on the bus to Vilnius. From there I took a nightly bus to Warsaw, where I arrived at 6 AM the next morning.

title: Exploring Warsaw, Poland!
description: I arrived at 6 AM in Warsaw. Stayed at another Airbnb and the host was very nice. We went to the Copernicus museum which wasn't so excited for us... Then we went to a couple more places which were very nice.

links.name: Visiting the Polish War Uprising Museum!

title: Visiting the Polish War Uprising Museum!
description: Today I went to some more sights in Warsaw, Poland. One of which was the Polish Uprising Museum, which was quite impressive.

title: I RECOGNIZE THIS!
description: Took a train from Warsaw, to Hannover. Due to some problems I had a layover in the city of Magdeburg, where I had been a few years ago.

title: THE LAST SIGHTSEEING PLACE!
description: Felt good to be back in Germany! Explored the city of Hanover for a little bit and realised this was gonna be the last place to sightsee on this line.

title: BACK HOME
description: My friend picked me up in Hanover and together we drove back to my home town: Rijnsburg. The trip is over, but next year I'm gonna be back at it again!
